name: ORS Key Worker Contact Report
description:
Report returns details of those Prisoners who have had a Key Worker case note Entry or Case note Session, if that entry was made at the current establishment (on latest admission) and the time elapsed between entries.
PDD0085 - v00.00.02 Last Modified: 12/12/2018

dataset.name: All
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, DT_ADMISSION.ADMISSION_DATE, CASE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS.RELEASE_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS.RELEASE_DATE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS.RELEASE_DATE IS NULL THEN DT_LAST_RELEASE_DATE.LAST_REL_DATE ELSE NULL END AS CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, (SELECT DISTINCT m.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, MAX(m.MOVEMENT_TIME) AS ADMISSION_DATE FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS m, OMS_OWNER.offender_bookings h WHERE h.booking_status = 'O' AND h.active_flag = 'Y' AND m.direction_code = 'IN' AND m.Movement_reason_code <> 'R' AND m.Movement_type = 'ADM' AND m.to_agy_loc_id = h.agy_loc_id AND h.offender_book_id = m.offender_book_id GROUP BY m.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) DT_ADMISSION, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS AT_OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS, (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, CASE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.HDCAD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.HDCAD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.APD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.APD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.PRRD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.PRRD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_CALCULATED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_CALCULATED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_CALCULATED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE ELSE NULL END AS Last_Rel_Date, EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS WHERE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID = (SELECT MAX(A.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS A WHERE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = A.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID)) DT_LAST_RELEASE_DATE, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, OMS_OWNER.LIVING_UNITS AT_LIVING_UNITS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID = AT_LIVING_UNITS.LIVING_UNIT_ID) AND (NOT AT_LIVING_UNITS.HOUSING_UNIT_TYPE IN ('OU', 'REC')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = DT_LAST_RELEASE_DATE.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = DT_ADMISSION.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (AT_LIVING_UNITS.AGY_LOC_ID || '-' || AT_LIVING_UNITS.LEVEL_1_CODE IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, ADMISSION_DATE, CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE, AGY_LOC_ID, COUNT(ALL.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) AS V_COUNT_ALL_PRISONERS, COUNT(KE_CASE_NOTES.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY KE_CASE_NOTES.CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE = 'KE') AS V_COUNT_CASE_NOTE_PRISONERS_33, COUNT(KS_CASE_NOTES.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY KS_CASE_NOTES.CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE = 'KS') AS V_COUNT_CASE_NOTE_PRISONERS_35, V_COUNT_ALL_PRISONERS - V_COUNT_CASE_NOTE_PRISONERS_ENTRY AS V_COUNT_PRISONERS_WITHOUT_CA42, V_COUNT_ALL_PRISONERS - V_COUNT_CASE_NOTE_PRISONERS_SESSION AS V_COUNT_PRISONERS_WITHOUT_CA44, V_COUNT_ALL_PRISONERS - V_COUNT_CASE_NOTE_PRISONERS_KA AS V_COUNT_PRISONERS_WITHOUT_EI45 FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: KE Case Notes
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, DT_ADMISSION.ADMISSION_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CONTACT_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CONTACT_TIME, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CASE_NOTE_TYPE, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE, CASE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS.RELEASE_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS.RELEASE_DATE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS.RELEASE_DATE IS NULL THEN DT_LAST_RELEASE_DATE.LAST_REL_DATE ELSE NULL END AS CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, (SELECT DISTINCT m.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, MAX(m.MOVEMENT_TIME) AS ADMISSION_DATE FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS m, OMS_OWNER.offender_bookings h WHERE h.booking_status = 'O' AND h.active_flag = 'Y' AND m.direction_code = 'IN' AND m.Movement_reason_code <> 'R' AND m.Movement_type = 'ADM' AND m.to_agy_loc_id = h.agy_loc_id AND h.offender_book_id = m.offender_book_id GROUP BY m.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) DT_ADMISSION, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS AT_OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS, (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, CASE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.HDCAD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.HDCAD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.APD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.APD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.PRRD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.PRRD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_CALCULATED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_CALCULATED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_CALCULATED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE ELSE NULL END AS Last_Rel_Date, EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS WHERE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID = (SELECT MAX(A.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS A WHERE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = A.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID)) DT_LAST_RELEASE_DATE, OMS_OWNER.LIVING_UNITS AT_LIVING_UNITS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID = AT_LIVING_UNITS.LIVING_UNIT_ID) AND (NOT AT_LIVING_UNITS.HOUSING_UNIT_TYPE IN ('OU', 'REC')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = DT_LAST_RELEASE_DATE.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = DT_ADMISSION.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (AT_LIVING_UNITS.AGY_LOC_ID || '-' || AT_LIVING_UNITS.LEVEL_1_CODE IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CONTACT_DATE >= TO_DATE('01-11-2018 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CASE_NOTE_TYPE IN ('KA') AND AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE = 'KE')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, AGY_LOC_ID, ADMISSION_DATE, CONTACT_DATE, CONTACT_TIME, CASE_NOTE_TYPE, CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE, CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE, CASE WHEN V_MAX_KE_CONTACT_DATE > (KE_CASE_NOTES.ADMISSION_DATE) THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_MAX_KE_CASE_NOTE_CURRENT_E32, (TO_DATE(V_MAX_KE_CONTACT_DATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY') - TO_DATE(TRUNC(SYSDATE), 'DD/MM/YYYY')) AS V_DAYS_SINCE_LAST_KE_CONTACT37, CASE WHEN V_DAYS_SINCE_LAST_KE_CONTACT_DATE_MAX > 7 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_7_DAYS_SINCE_LAST_KE_CONTA43, CASE WHEN V_DAYS_SINCE_LAST_KE_CONTACT_DATE_MAX > 14 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_14_DAYS_SINCE_LAST_KE_CONT44, CASE WHEN KE_CASE_NOTES.CONTACT_TIME > (KE_CASE_NOTES.ADMISSION_DATE) THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_KE_CASE_NOTE_CURRENT_ESTAB, (TO_DATE(V_PREV_KE_CONTACT_DATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY') - TO_DATE((KE_CASE_NOTES.CONTACT_DATE), 'DD/MM/YYYY')) AS V_DAYS_BETWEEN_KE_CONTACT_AN45, CASE WHEN V_DAYS_BETWEEN_KE_CONTACT_AND_PREVCONTACTDATE > 14 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_OVER_14_DAYS_SINCE_CONTACT31 FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: KS Case Notes
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, DT_ADMISSION.ADMISSION_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CONTACT_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CONTACT_TIME, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CASE_NOTE_TYPE, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE, CASE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS.RELEASE_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS.RELEASE_DATE WHEN AT_OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS.RELEASE_DATE IS NULL THEN DT_LAST_RELEASE_DATE.LAST_REL_DATE ELSE NULL END AS CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, (SELECT DISTINCT m.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, MAX(m.MOVEMENT_TIME) AS ADMISSION_DATE FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS m, OMS_OWNER.offender_bookings h WHERE h.booking_status = 'O' AND h.active_flag = 'Y' AND m.direction_code = 'IN' AND m.Movement_reason_code <> 'R' AND m.Movement_type = 'ADM' AND m.to_agy_loc_id = h.agy_loc_id AND h.offender_book_id = m.offender_book_id GROUP BY m.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) DT_ADMISSION, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS AT_OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS, (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, CASE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.HDCAD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.HDCAD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.APD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.APD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.PRRD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.PRRD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_CALCULATED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_CALCULATED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_CALCULATED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE ELSE NULL END AS Last_Rel_Date, EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS WHERE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID = (SELECT MAX(A.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS A WHERE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = A.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID)) DT_LAST_RELEASE_DATE, OMS_OWNER.LIVING_UNITS AT_LIVING_UNITS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_RELEASE_DETAILS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID = AT_LIVING_UNITS.LIVING_UNIT_ID) AND (NOT AT_LIVING_UNITS.HOUSING_UNIT_TYPE IN ('OU', 'REC')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = DT_LAST_RELEASE_DATE.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = DT_ADMISSION.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND ((AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (AT_LIVING_UNITS.AGY_LOC_ID || '-' || AT_LIVING_UNITS.LEVEL_1_CODE IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CONTACT_DATE >= TO_DATE('01-11-2018 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CASE_NOTE_TYPE IN ('KA') AND AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE = 'KS')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, AGY_LOC_ID, ADMISSION_DATE, CONTACT_DATE, CONTACT_TIME, CASE_NOTE_TYPE, CASE_NOTE_SUB_TYPE, CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE, CASE WHEN V_MAX_KS_CONTACT_DATE > (KS_CASE_NOTES.ADMISSION_DATE) THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_MAX_KS_CASE_NOTE_CURRENT_E32, (TO_DATE(V_MAX_KS_CONTACT_DATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY') - TO_DATE(TRUNC(SYSDATE), 'DD/MM/YYYY')) AS V_DAYS_SINCE_LAST_KS_CONTACT37, CASE WHEN V_DAYS_SINCE_LAST_KS_CONTACT_DATE_MAX > 7 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_7_DAYS_SINCE_LAST_KS_CONTA43, CASE WHEN V_DAYS_SINCE_LAST_KS_CONTACT_DATE_MAX > 14 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_14_DAYS_SINCE_LAST_KS_CONT44, CASE WHEN KS_CASE_NOTES.CONTACT_DATE > (KS_CASE_NOTES.ADMISSION_DATE) THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_KS_CASE_NOTE_CURRENT_ESTAB, (TO_DATE(V_PREV_KS_CONTACT_DATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY') - TO_DATE((KS_CASE_NOTES.CONTACT_DATE), 'DD/MM/YYYY')) AS V_DAYS_BETWEEN_KS_CONTACT_AN45, CASE WHEN V_DAYS_BETWEEN_KS_CONTACT_AND_PREVCONTACTDATE > 14 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_OVER_14_DAYS_SINCE_CONTACT31 FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE (V_14_DAYS_SINCE_LAST_KS_CONT44 = 'Yes' OR V_7_DAYS_SINCE_LAST_KS_CONTA43 = 'Yes'))

field.name: $ref:V_MAX_KS_CASE_NOTE_CURRENT_E32
field.display: Case Note Entered at Current Estab? (Curr. Admission)

field.name: $ref:V_DAYS_SINCE_LAST_KS_CONTACT37
field.display: No. of days since last contact

field.name: $ref:V_KS_CASE_NOTE_CURRENT_ESTAB
field.display: Case Note Entered at Current Estab? (Curr. Admn)
field.legacySql: =If([KS Case Notes].[Contact Date] > ([KS Case Notes].[Admission Date]);"Yes"; "No")

field.name: $ref:V_DAYS_SINCE_LAST_KS_CONTACT37
field.display: No. of days since last contact

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE (V_14_DAYS_SINCE_LAST_KE_CONT44 = 'Yes' OR V_7_DAYS_SINCE_LAST_KE_CONTA43 = 'Yes'))

field.name: $ref:V_MAX_KE_CASE_NOTE_CURRENT_E32
field.display: Case Note Entered at Current Estab? (Curr. Admission)

field.name: $ref:V_DAYS_SINCE_LAST_KE_CONTACT37
field.display: No. of days since last contact

field.name: $ref:V_KE_CASE_NOTE_CURRENT_ESTAB
field.display: Case Note Entered at Current Estab? (Curr. Admn)
field.legacySql: =If([KE Case Notes].[Contact Time] > ([KE Case Notes].[Admission Date]);"Yes"; "No")

field.name: $ref:V_DAYS_SINCE_LAST_KE_CONTACT37
field.display: No. of days since last contact

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE V_NO_CONTACT = 1)

field.name: $ref:V_COUNT_CASE_NOTE_PRISONERS_33
field.display: Prisoners with a Key Worker Entry
field.legacySql: =Count([KE Case Notes].[NOMS Number]) Where ([KE Case Notes].[Case Note Sub Type] = "KE")
